text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street now
Searching for the glow
City lights are fading
But I won't let go

[Verse 2]
Colors paint the skyline
Pink and gold ablaze
Lost in endless twilight
In the evening haze

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams are calling
Chase them through the night
In this magic moment
Everything feels right

[Verse 3]
Stars begin their dancing
Moonlight starts to rise
Gonna keep on running
Reaching for the skies

[Bridge]
Feel the rhythm in me
Heartbeats sync with stars
In this boundless evening
Nothing seems too far

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams are calling
Chase them through the night
In this magic moment
Everything feels right
title: Sunset Dreams
